item.title: AMD GCN ISA Syntax Highlighting for Vim
item.description: I got into low-level shader optimizations lately, and realised that not many tools are provided for the job. Since i’m looking at GCN assembly regularly now, i used the occasion to write a decent syntax highlighting for it inside vim. That way i got to go through the whole GCN ISA document (props to AMD for having the only public GPU ISA out there) as well as learning some vim scripting basics!
